text: Lyudmila Vasilyevna Storozhkova (neé Bartenyeva; Людмила Васильевна Сторожкова; 19 November 1955 — 23 November 2022) was a Russian track and field athlete, who competed for the Soviet Union. At the 1978 European Athletics Championships she won the gold medal in the 4 × 100 metres relay event. She also won medals at the 1977, 1978 and 1979 European Athletics Indoor Championships in the 60 metre. With the relay team she won the bronze medal at the 1977 IAAF World Cup and the silver medal at the 1977 European Cup.Скончалась чемпионка Европы 1978 года в эстафете легкоатлетка Сторожкова, sport-interfax.ru, 24 November 2022 Lyudmila STOROZHKOVA, World Athletics ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Soviet sprinters
title: Lyudmila Storozhkova
